nangmansea.tip.enjoy: If you really want to enjoy the game, try Hardcore!
nangmansea.tip.mining: Digging in the sea doesn't seem like a good idea.
nangmansea.tip.diamond: Diamond only generate in the deep ocean!
nangmansea.tip.trident: Tridents have separate enchantments for ranged and melee. you can't have both, so choose wisely!
nangmansea.tip.quest: Did you lost your Quest Book? Open your inventory and click the book icon at the top left!
nangmansea.tip.nangman: Most of my modpacks inculde a hint for the next content in the final reward
